title: Fruitcake Chakram
summaries: The Fruitcake Chakram is a boomerang-type weapon dropped from Presents obtained during the Christmas seasonal event, with a chance of 0.626% in pre-Hardmode and 0.584% in Hardmode. Unlike the Thorn Chakram, it will not bounce off of blocks.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Damage: 19 / 14 (Melee)
statistics.Sell: 1
